info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was a great experience...all the instructions were clear and the host was friendly too...highly recommended

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
We stayed a month during April 2024 at the Lakeview Apartment. Our flight landed in Dhaka quite late at night, and the host helped us immensely arranging a check in at 3am. The apartment was clean and had the amenities listed. Cleaning products were provided, as well as there was someone coming in regularly to clean as we were staying for a whole month.
The best features would definitely be the below:
A. There are 2 garden terraces facing the adjacent lake - which was a good spot to spend some time early mornings and evenings
B. The Uttara North Metro Station was a walkable distance that allowed for fast travel into the parts of Dhaka we wanted to go to regularly
C. The surrounding area is pristine with Lakes, Trees and places to eat and drink
Lakeview apartments are a nice find within the area and we would highly recommend.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: My Airbnb experience was confusing Because of poor communication with the host. The apartment was also infested with mosquitoes, but the host did provide a mosquito racket. However it was a nice stay and the apartment was clean. It would have been even better if there was an option for maid service. And also if the communication didn’t happen via whtsapp or other platforms outside of Airbnb, especially when no notice was given. At last I think the cleaning fee was excessively high given the circumstances in Bangladesh.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Great place! Really clean. Owner and caretaker were very helpful. Had a comfortable stay with my family.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Helpful and accommodating host. Place was clear and nice. Too much mosquitoes. Area isn't very visible at night. It's hard to get food at night. Food delivery isn't available in the area. Overall place and host were good.
Great place to stay, very neat and clean, nice balcony with view and very friendly host
yes it's worth and the owner Mr.abdul sattar is very helpful

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
A very nice and clean flat with open large balconies overlooking interrupted view. The place is at 'a stone throw' from the metro railway to get to the city in 30-45 minutes, a perfect opportunity to avoid the traffic congestion in the road , specifically in rush hours.
The host was very welcoming and helpful. He allowed early check in.
It is very close to the airport yet not far from the city with options of both rail and road communications.
Local amenities are not far.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Really clean place and very friendly host! We had a great stay at the apartment and it was very clean.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: This place was completely new and super clean, they provided everything we needed and the host was very helpful and responsive. Only issue with this place is that there are lots of mosquitos due to the location (developing area and close to a lake), however the host provided aerosols, mosquito nets and electric bats.
